attributes.action: Enable key workers to use London Taxis free of charge during epidemic
attributes.additional_details: It is not acceptable that key workers, already putting their health at risk, should be expected to use public transport during this time.  Some taxi apps have given reduced fares but these are still out of the reach of many key workers who are often low paid.  London taxi drivers have little work at the moment and high costs leasing their cabs.
attributes.background: Government should fund travel for key workers to get to and from their place of work using licensed London black taxis during this crisis.
